name: Get in the Coop! (fungifurball)
description:
Theme

Move around the fence and try to get your chickens back home!

Team Members

Cindy (me): concept, coding and Unity

Michell (pumibless): 2D asset creation, UI design, sound effects

David (zhanj170): 3D asset creation

Goal

Move the chickens into the coop, simple right?

How

Walk up to chickens to herd them in a direction

But watch out! These fellows are wild!

Warning!

Even after setting up your environment in a safe place, be cautious of your surroundings!

Where

The coop you have placed down at the start of the game is where you want the chickens to go!

Gate

You will have to manually open and close the gate so watch out for the problematic ones that might escape!

Winning Condition

At the top of the screen you will see your number of chickens herded and a timer above it tracking your total completion. Do your best!
